Comments_List: Hindi grammatical structures.
I advanced my Hindi reading, writing, and speaking abilities in this class. I also learned a lot about certain current event issues in India through readings.
Definitely helps enhance your knowledge from L3, more focus on grammar and vocabulary.
Reading, Writing, Expanding Vocabulary, Cultural Awareness, Popular Literary Pieces, Idioms, Conversation Practice, Grammar
My speaking, reading & writing fluidity greatly improved in this course
Better Hindi.
hindi grammar, how to read, write,think, form arguments, express myself, and be creative!
Wonderful course with a wonderful professor. Less homework would be nice, but I do see its purpose.
I thought this class was very engaging. I learned so much while also having so much fun in this class. There was a good balance between reading/writing practice and speaking/discussions.
Strengths are the Professor definitely, Swapna Ji is amazing and the weekly quizzes make sure you stay engaged with the material.

Strengths: Amazing Professor, Amazing Class, Amazing Peers
Weaknesses: Class is a hidden gem that's not advertised enough
Wonderful teacher.
strengths - workload is very manageable and weekly quizzes help you stay on top, class format is laid back and discussion/media/text based which is cool

Yes, take the class, Swapna Ji really cares about her students and you will learn a lot while also having fun in class every day. The class becomes like a second family at Yale and everyone in it really loved being there. The teacher and TAs while go out of their way to give you the best experience from the class as possible.
Absolutely; great way to continue learning Hindi with a lovely instructor.

I would definitely recommend this course to a student who has some background in Hindi and wants to advance their skills and learn about various issues. It learned a lot while also having a great time.
Definitely take this class!!! It is amazing and you meet so many incredible people.
Yes, especially if you are a heritage, but not native (born in India) Hindi speaker.
Yes!
Yes, if you have some background in Hindi. Swapna ji is one of the best teachers I have had here.
yes!! swapna ji is incredible
